item.title: So Good They Can't Ignore You
item.description: Why is Following the Romantic Notion of Passion Bad Advice? I have read many books on productivity but this one stood out to me since the thesis was taking on a central dogma of a large portion of the US society: that following your passion is the key to happiness and fulfillment in the modern world. I have always been skeptical of this hypothesis, but I have not seen a well stated alternative worldview that does not have tremendous downsides.
